# Overview 

References: 

- [Blog post by Monica Alexander](https://www.monicaalexander.com/posts/2020-28-02-bayes_viz/)


# Libraries 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rstan)
library(brms)
library(bayesplot)
library(loo)
library(tidybayes)
library(here)
```

# Reading in data 

```{r}
ds <- read_rds(here::here("data", "births_2017_sample.RDS"))

ds <- 
  ds %>% 
  rename(birthweight = dbwt, 
         gest = combgest) %>% 
  mutate(preterm = ifelse(gest < 32, "Y", "N")) %>% 
  filter(ilive == "Y", 
         gest < 99, 
         birthweight < 9.999)

str(ds)
head(ds)
```
